metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6820 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
rcube_utils.php in Roundcube before 1.1.8 and 1.2.x before 1.2.4 issusceptible to a cross-site scripting vulnerability via a crafted CascadingStyle Sheets (CSS) token sequence within an SVG element.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6820` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

roundcube - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-core - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-mysql - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-pgsql - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-plugins - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-sqlite3 - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: roundcube package in esm-apps/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.6+dfsg.1-1').
